attributes.additional_details:
SAVE OUR CENTRES, STOP SERVICE CUTS!!!!!!!!!

Managment say that there will be no cuts to Children's centres but we believe that 17 centres will be run down.


Managment want to change services away from 0-5 years old to 0-19 year olds.


In the future these services won't be for everyone but a group of senior managers will say who deserves a service and who doesn't!!!

Managment want to open only 15 Children's Centres on a full-time basis>

DO YOU WANT TO SAVE OUR CENTRES???????
